  • namespace dialog

namespace dialog¶

Overview¶

Dialog message boxes wrapper functions. More…

namespace dialog {

// global functions

void Error(const std::string& msg, const std::string& title = "Error");
void Warning(const std::string& msg, const std::string& title = "Warning");
void Info(const std::string& msg, const std::string& title = "Information");
bool Confirmation(const std::string& question, const std::string& title = "Confirmation");

} // namespace dialog

Detailed Documentation¶

Dialog message boxes wrapper functions.

Global Functions¶

void Error(const std::string& msg, const std::string& title = "Error")

Shows error dialog and displays message. Program waits until user confirms.

void Warning(const std::string& msg, const std::string& title = "Warning")

Show warning dialog and displays message. Program waits until user confirms.

void Info(const std::string& msg, const std::string& title = "Information")

Show information dialog with specified message. Program waits until user confirms.

Creates an info log message. Thread safe function.

bool Confirmation(const std::string& question, const std::string& title = "Confirmation")

Show dialog with YES and NO buttons and returns answer. Program waits until user selects answer.
